org.ofbiz.core.util

Class UtilFormatOut

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ofbiz.core.util.UtilFormatOut

  • public class UtilFormatOut
extends java.lang.Object
    General output formatting functions - mainly for helping in JSPs

    2.0
